sentences.sContent: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.sCn: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.sContent: ...with just a small proportion of consumers preferring more luxurious alternatives...
...a large proportion of staff are temporary contractors...
...the proportion of students taking college-level exams...
...yet the chart of Weekly earnings in 2010 reveals a forceful counter-evidence that the income is in direct proportion to one's educational background...
...By measuring the proportion of heavier hydrogen and oxygen isotopes along a strand of hair...
...but they did not differ in the length of utterances or proportion of questions asked...

phrases.pCn: adv. 按…比例；依…程度而变
判断推动轻重缓急的能力

remMethod.val: pro(许多) ＋ portion(一部分) → 按比例分成小份儿 → 比例； 份儿

words.tran: 比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的
成比例的；相称的；适当的
成比例的；相称的；均衡的
成比例地；相称地，适当地

trans.tranOther: A proportion of a group or an amount is a part of it
